title: When or where is BTS having its live stream? - Quora

response.answer_text: BTS MOTS:ONE will go live on OCT 10TH and OCT 11TH via concerts.kiswe.com. To buy tickets go to weverse shop and pay for the best concert option for you. There's so many to choose from (like the day and the screen type etc) Once you do all of this, you'll get a notification on what to do next in terms of going onto to website and registering for the concert(name etc)
